page.title: 18ELDERLY PEOPLE IN BOGNOR
page.content:
There are many elderly people living in the area. They come{to retire}in Bognor, because of the sea and peaceful atmosphere. Some come to live or stay in{rest, convalescent and {nursing homes.} Some come to be near their families in their retirement.
Doctors and clergymen spend much of their time caring for elderly people. One advantage of living in the area is that it is very flat and easy to get around. Shops are close by and there are activities for older people.
There are many small houses and bungalows, suitable for retired people. Kings Haven, a home for elderly, mentally handicapped people, has been built on land originally intended for an infants school.
